method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the Page.

parameters.name: at
parameters.shortdesc: The location of the new page relative to the reference object or within the document or spread.

parameters.name: reference
parameters.shortdesc: The reference object. Note: Required when the at parameter value specifies before or after. Can accept: Page, Spread, MasterSpread or Document.

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new Page

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the Page with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the Page with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the Page with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the Pages within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The Page, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: Page, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The Page, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: Page, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first Page in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last Page in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle Page in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Page with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the Page that follows the desired Page.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Page whose index follows the specified Page in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The Page whose index comes before the desired Page.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any Page in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every Page in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Page.
Returns the Page with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
